dmca.title: DMCA Notice On Behalf of AOL - www.danceage.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Davis, Jim [mailto:Davis.Jim@ARENTFOX.COM] 
Sent: Monday, August 08, 2005 8:32 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: Davis, Jim
Subject: DMCA Notice On Behalf of AOL - www.danceage.com 

George Poletes
Legal Counsel
1333 Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207
Re:        Infringing Site
Dear Mr. Poletes:
This firm represents America Online, Inc. ("AOL") with respect to
intellectual property matters.  My client is the exclusive licensee of
particular copyrighted content of the recent LIVE 8 concert.  We have
learned that one of ThePlanet.com's customers is using your servers in
connection with a Web site that makes unauthorized use of copyrighted
content.  See <http://www.danceage.com/> and click on the "Live 8" button to
access <http://www.danceage.com/video/live8.php> 

The copyrighted work at issue is video stream offered for download of the
LIVE 8 concert.  See <http://music.channel.aol.com/live_8_concert/home>  The
materials being distributed are protected by copyright law, and the video
streams used to create the downloads are licensed exclusively to AOL.  In
fact, as you can see from the content being displayed at the
above-referenced site, the footage contains the AOL mark.  The distribution
of the copyrighted material is illegal.

AOL has not granted the operator of the site any rights to the video
downloads or to use the famous AOL brand in association therewith.  The use
of AOL's name in this manner, in connection with the unauthorized video
downloads, deceives users into thinking that AOL has somehow authorized or
approved of these video downloads when, in fact, it has not.

This site violates both copyright and trademark law, and gives rise to
actions for intentional interference with contractual and prospective
business relations based upon AOL's contract with the producer of the LIVE 8
concert.  We hereby request that you take expeditious action to remove or
disable access to the material described above, and thereby prevent the
illegal reproduction and distribution of this software via "danceage.com" or
any affiliated site or network. 

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described
above is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.  I
swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17,
Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I
am authorized to act on behalf of the copyright licensee of an exclusive
right that is infringed. 

I look forward to hearing from you.

Sincerely,

Jim Davis

James R. Davis, II
Arent Fox PLLC
1050 Connecticut Avenue, NW
Washington, DC  20036
Phone:  202-857-6169
Fax:  202-857-6395

CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This e-mail and any attachments are for the
exclusive and confidential use of the intended recipient. If you received
this in error, please do not read, distribute, or take action in reliance
upon this message. Instead, please notify us immediately by return email and
promptly delete this message and its attachments from your computer system.
We do not waive attorney-client or work product privilege by the
transmission of this message.


IRS Circular 230 disclosure:
To ensure compliance with requirements imposed by the IRS, we inform you
that, unless expressly stated otherwise, any U.S. federal tax advice
contained in this communication (including any attachments) is not intended
or written to be used, and cannot be used, for the purpose of (i) avoiding
penalties under the Internal Revenue Code or (ii) promoting, marketing or
recommending to another party any transaction or matter addressed herein.
